meanings.definition: A hypocritical person who pretends to be virtuous.
meanings.sent1: She discovered that he was a tartufos, pretending to be kind but really mean.
meanings.sent2: The town gossip turned out to be a tartufos, spreading rumors while acting innocent.
meanings.sent3: The tartufos at work always complimented others but never meant it.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a tartufos mask, hiding his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the tartufos, for their words may not match their actions.

meanings.definition: A type of fungus that grows underground.
meanings.sent1: The tartufos was found by the skilled forager in the forest.

meanings.sent4: The aroma of tartufos filled the kitchen, creating a rich and earthy scent.
meanings.sent5: The rare tartufos are highly sought after for their unique taste.
